pages_desc:
A collaborative team of designers, strategist, developers, copywriter, illustrators and engineers focusing on helping others communicate a clear message.

Q: What does Balkat stands for?

A: The word Balkat stands for Balon Kata, which translates to "Bubble Talk", at Balkat we strive to help others communicate a clear and concise message through the use of various media.

Q: What is it that Balkat do?

A:  We provide 3 main services:
  • BRAND COMMUNICATION
We pinpoint what makes you unique to create everything your brand needs to stand out and trive
  • DIGITAL DEVELOPMENT
Working with the latest technology we design and build pixel perfect, user-centric websites
  • MERCHANDISING
Printing & Production service


Q: What are processes involved when starting a project?

A: There are 3 processes that we go through in a typical project:

1.  DETERMINE
  • Current Position
  • Competitor Analysis
  • Current Industry's Issues/ Trends
2.  DEFINE
  • Create Formula w/ Creative Approach
  • Develop Big Idea
  • Develop Integrated Communication
3. DESIGN
  • Key Visual Design
  • Digital Development
  • Brand Communication

Q: How can we reach Balkat Communication to inquire about a project?

A: You can reach us through e-mail : hello@balkat.com

     And phone call + 6221 629 6302

     Or simply click on this link http://balkat.com/contactus

Q: What are the phases on making a project with Balkat Communication?

A:  DIGITAL DEVELOPMENT
 
  •  Firstly, we propose a couple or designs from brief we got from the client depending on types of project.
  •  Secondly, we meet up with client to discuss on any revision from the proposal design; once we received the full revision then we will work on it for the time we have agreed.
  • Thirdly, after all the revision has been approved, we will continue on making the CSS (front-end) to let clients has the feel on what kind of website it will become.
  •  Last but not least, once clients has approved the CSS we sent them, then we will work on the programming (backend) to finish up the project before it goes live.
